alert.note: Alert for Deuel (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:19PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Deuel County through 545 PM MDT... At 518 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sunol to 6 miles northwest of Sedgwick to 7 miles northwest of Marks Butte. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chappell, Big Springs, Barton and Goldeneye State Wildlife Management Area. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 78 and 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
